OnBeforeFormat(pYFIELDNAME,pYTEXT,pYFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; OnBeforeFormat ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 27-Oct-2014 SCR HEVA-1580: Calculate Status based on Time ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dtEnd,dtStart,idDispSta,idField,idKey,intCol,intRow,linhaValidadas,objMEDPrescription new status,strTimes
$$$GRIDSplitKey(pYFIELDNAME,intRow,intCol)
set idField = $$$GetClassField(YFORM,intCol) set idKey = $$ReferenceKey^COMGridEdit31Interface(YFORM,intRow)
set status = $$CheckUrgent(idKey) set linhaValidadas = $$CheckLinhasValidadas(idKey) set objMEDPrescription = $get(^MEDPrescription(YM,idKey,1))
if (idField = 1) { if (status = $$$Vermelho) { set YBACKGROUNDCOLOR = "RED" } else { if ($$$MEDPrescriptionStatus(objMEDPrescription) = 2) { set YBACKGROUNDCOLOR = "LIGHTGREEN" } else { if (linhaValidadas = $$$Verde) { set YBACKGROUNDCOLOR = "LIGHTGREEN" } elseif (linhaValidadas = $$$Amarelo) { set YBACKGROUNDCOLOR = "YELLOW" } } } set strTimes = $get(^WWWDATEN(0,+$h,YUSER,"VARDispensacaoViaPrescricao","M",1)) set dtStart = $piece(strTimes,Y,1) set dtEnd = $piece(strTimes,Y,2) if idKey'="" { if (dtStart'="")&&(dtEnd'="") { if (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesHEVA($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) { do SetTime^VARDispensacaoViaPrescricaoLinha(.dtStart,.dtEnd) ; Convert Time to Date and Time } do DoseStatusTime^MEDPrescription(idKey,dtStart,dtEnd,.idDispSta) set:'idDispSta idDispSta=1 ; Default to awaiting validation set YTEXT = $$GetDescription^WWWStatus("MEDPrescription",+idDispSta,$get(SPRACHE))
} } ; set YTEXT="xxx" }
quit
CheckUrgent(pNumPrescricao) new objPrescLine, idLinha, flagUrgente set flagUrgente = $$$NO set idLinha = ""
for{ set idLinha = $order(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,pNumPrescricao,idLinha)) quit:idLinha=""
set objPrescLine = $get(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,pNumPrescricao,idLinha,1))
if ($$$MEDPrescriptionLineUrgent(objPrescLine) > 0){ set flagUrgente = $$$Vermelho quit } }
quit flagUrgente
CheckLinhasValidadas(pNumPrescricao) new objPrescLine, idLinha, flagValidacao set flagValidacao = $$$Verde set idLinha = ""
for{ set idLinha = $order(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,pNumPrescricao,idLinha)) quit:idLinha=""
set objPrescLine = $get(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,pNumPrescricao,idLinha,1))
if ($$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objPrescLine) '= 2){ set flagValidacao = $$$Amarelo quit } }
quit flagValidacao
ValidarPrescricao() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Validate Prescription ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 14-Oct-2014 SCR HEVA-1580: Pass in Times ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strStatus,NumPrescricao,strTimes,dtStart,dtEnd
set NumPrescricao = $$$GRIDGetCurrentYKEY
set strStatus = $$CanValidate^MEDPrescriptionHosp(NumPrescricao, $get(^MEDPrescription(YM,NumPrescricao,1)))
if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { set YBACK = $replace(YBACK,"VARDispensacaoViaPrescricaoLinha","VARDispensacaoViaPrescricao") set YFORM = "VARDispensacaoViaPrescricao"
set strTimes = $get(^WWWDATEN(0,+$h,YUSER,"VARDispensacaoViaPrescricao","M",1)) set dtStart = $piece(strTimes,Y,1) set dtEnd = $piece(strTimes,Y,2) do SetTime(.dtStart,.dtEnd) set strStatus = $$Validate^MEDPrescriptionHosp(NumPrescricao,dtStart,dtEnd)
if ($$$ISERR(strStatus)){ $$$JS("alert('"_$$DecodeError^COMUtilError(strStatus,$$$YES)_"')") do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARDispensacaoViaPrescricao","") quit }
} elseif ($$$ISERR(strStatus)){ $$$JS("alert('A prescrição não pode ser validada.')") do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARDispensacaoViaPrescricao","") quit }
quit
SetTime(&pdtStart,&pdtEnd,pdtCur="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Add Date to Times based on current time ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: Created Pass in Times ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dtCurDate,dtCurTime,dtEndtDate,dtStartDate,intCurSecs,intEndSecs,intStartSecs new intWin
set:pdtCur="" pdtCur = $h set dtCurTime = $piece(pdtCur,",",2) set dtCurDate = $piece(pdtCur,",",1) set dtStartDate = dtCurDate ; Asuume Current Day set dtEndtDate = dtCurDate ; Assume Current Day set intCurSecs = dtCurDate*86400+dtCurTime set intStartSecs= dtStartDate*86400+pdtStart set intEndSecs = dtEndtDate*86400+pdtEnd set intWin = 12*60*60
if intStartSecs+intWin<intCurSecs { ; If Start Time is Less than 12 Hours use next day set dtStartDate = dtCurDate+1 } if intStartSecs-intWin>intCurSecs { ; If Start Time is more than 12 Hours use last day set dtStartDate = dtCurDate-1 }
if intEndSecs+intWin<intCurSecs { ; If End Time is Less than 12 Hours use next day set dtEndtDate = dtCurDate+1 } if intEndSecs-intWin>intCurSecs { ; If End Time is more than 12 Hours use last day set dtEndtDate = dtCurDate-1 } set intStartSecs= dtStartDate*86400+pdtStart set intEndSecs = dtEndtDate*86400+pdtEnd
if intStartSecs>intEndSecs { ; set dtEndtDate = dtEndtDate+1 }
set:pdtStart'="" pdtStart = dtStartDate_","_pdtStart set:pdtEnd'="" pdtEnd = dtEndtDate_","_pdtEnd
quit
